edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands

Class GitBranchOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands.GitBranchOptions

  • public class GitBranchOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage passing branch options to the GitBranch command.

      • getOptAbbrevLen

        public int getOptAbbrevLen()
        Indicates if the length other than default length should be used for --abbrev option.
        Returns:
        An integer value for abbrev length if the --abbrev option should be used.

      • checkCanSetNoArgOption

        public void checkCanSetNoArgOption(java.lang.String option)
        Checks whether an option for displaying branches can be set. If not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.

      • checkCanSetCreateOption

        public void checkCanSetCreateOption(java.lang.String option)
        Checks whether an option for creating a branch can be set. If not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.

      • checkCanSetDeleteOption

        Checks whether an option for deleting a branch or branch list can be set. If not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.

      • checkCanSetRenameOption

        public void checkCanSetRenameOption(java.lang.String option)
        Checks whether an option for renaming a branch can be set. If not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.
